name: Shadow Man: 2econd Coming
synopsis: Mike Leroi is Shadow Man - undead demon hunter and protector of the world. Follow him on a twisted voodoo journey through the darkest recesses of the soul as he battles the Grigori, a group of sadistic demons bent on returning their monstrous leader, Osmodeus, from the pit. If they succeed, darkness and destruction will befall humanity - only the power of Shadow Man can stop them now...
